kDesc
After hours in the gym the King of the Beach likes nothing more than to show off his muscles. [#Legal]
Après avoir passé des heures à la salle de sport, le roi de la plage est ravi d'exhiber ses muscles. [#Legal]
Nach stundenlangem Schwitzen im Fitnessstudio liebt es der Strandkönig, mit seinen Muskelpaketen anzugeben. [#Legal]
Dopo ore in palestra, il re della spiaggia ama soprattutto mettere in mostra i suoi muscoli. [#Legal]
Tras horas en el gimnasio, al rey de la playa solo le preocupa una cosa: presumir de músculos. [#Legal]
ジムで何時間も鍛えるビーチキングは、何よりも自分の筋肉を自慢するのが大好き。 [#Legal]
After hours in the gym the King of the Beach likes nothing more than to show off his muscles. [#Legal]
